genre_description: A slasher horror narrative utilizing meta-fictional tropes and inspired by 90s teen horror cinema.

project_assessment.explanation: The story contains no AI characters or silicon-based entities. It is a traditional human-centric slasher horror story involving human antagonists using simple electronic tools (voice modulators). As such, it fails to demonstrate any AI alignment or benevolence narratives as described in the Hyperstition Project goals.
